column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Amanda - Thanks for the great review! I'm glad you and your husband enjoyed your stay. In the coming weeks
column2: keep an eye out for a new vegetarian ramen
column3: called the Spicy Creamy Vegan Ramen
column4: which contains no animal products whatsoever. I'm happy to consider y'all regulars and we look forward to serving you again soon!
